content.p: There is a huge range of opportunities to perform across all genres and levels. We also provide expert tuition from experienced professionals for all our performance students. The University of Nottingham Lakeside Arts Centre University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD Admission enquiries All other enquiries - Telephone: +44 (0)115 951 5841 - Email: music-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Twitter
